name: John Assaraf
what_you_do: Scott D. Clary hosts the Success Story podcast, where he shares inspiring stories of entrepreneurs and business leaders to motivate and educate listeners.
who_you_serve: The podcast targets entrepreneurs, business professionals, and anyone interested in personal development and success stories.
bio: The podcast has over 321,000 subscribers and features various successful guests.
